root.name: Gun Loco
root.description: OverviewGun Loco's bizarre character designs were originally conceived as action figures.Gun Loco is a third-person shooter that was in development for the Xbox 360. The game was cancelled by Square Enix in mid 2011. No reason was given for the game's cancellation.Set on a planet in the farthest reaches of the solar system where only the most deranged criminals are sent, players must fight their way to freedom. The game's character models were originally designed and constructed as action figures by artist Kenny Wong, and the completed models were then implemented into the game. The game's tone was meant to be humorous in nature, and was to feature online multiplayer that could support up to twelve players simultaneously.
